name: Yatzy Online
description:
Yatzy, Yahtzee, le Yams, Generala, Jatsi, Yacht – these are just few of the names this popular dice game goes by!

The app allows you to play with all of your Facebook friends and random people from all over the world, whichever device they use, by offering a real time gaming experience on your tablet, smartphone, or computer! Furthermore, the app includes a game center that features high scores, leaderboards and all kinds of achievements.

The rules for playing Yatzy Online are very simple to learn and this totally addictive game is all-age appropriate.

You have an option to play the 3 most popular variations of the game:

- 5 Dice International (The world wide “accepted” rule set for playing Yatzy)
- 5 Dice Scandinavian (This variant is mostly played in the Scandinavian countries)
- 6 Dice version (The more advanced variant of the game which will be loved by the ones looking for a bigger challenge)

You can play these variants of the game online competing with others or offline without using the Internet - it’s up to you! All you have to do is download this classic dice game and enjoy it with your friends and family completely for free!

For bug reports, enhancements or improvements ideas, send us an email at support@fictionalfactory.com
